text.section: The plats and estimates prepared by the Administration require approval by a resolution of the Commission.

If the plats and estimates are approved by the Commission:
The Chairman of the Commission shall sign the cover sheet of each set of plats; and
A set of plats and its signed cover sheet shall be filed for record with:
The secretary of the Commission; and
The State Archives.

section.section: The secretary of the Commission shall record the plats filed with him.
Plats filed with the State Archives shall be electronically recorded as provided in § 9-1011 of the State Government Article.
